name: sparky
title: Sparky
description: Sparky is a live data binding DOM templating engine that enhances HTML with declarative tags and composeable templates, and batches rendering changes to the browser frame rate.

scripts.lint: npm run lint-modules && npm run lint-plugins
scripts.build: npm run build-iife && npm run build-min
scripts.build-version: npm run build && cp dist/sparky.js dist/sparky-3.0.4.js && cp dist/sparky.min.js dist/sparky-3.0.4.min.js && cp dist/sparky.css dist/sparky-3.0.4.css
